attributes.action: Renationalise the basic amenities of the nation, namely water, fuel, and electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The arguments for renationalisation are as follows:
No private companies whose aim is to make profit, not provide good service.
Organisations that must provide for you, no matter where your live.
Any money that is made, will always be reinvested- some London water pipes are over 100 years old!
Affordable rates, from a organisation that is employed by you.

So long as the system is auditted(I would recommend a independent committee appointed by parliament) excessive money will not be a problem- there is no reason why government cannot run a successful, efficent company if it tries hard enough!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
